longDescription:
HP-01 percussion trigger pad offers electronic musicians a hand-made instrument, designed to be 100% maintainable, customizable, and inspiring to use.

HP-01 is plug-and-play via USB, seamlessly integrating into Pro-Tools, Logic, or any DAW.

Ditch your laptop on stage, and add a DB-01 to make HP-01 a live performance tool like no other.
title: HP-01 Percussion Pad
